title: No reason
body: hello riot i got my account banned and i dont know why and i cant even login i starded to play it on season 6 and i want to start playing league of legends riot can u unban my account that i could play league again???{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: If you don't know why you were banned, submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). They'll be able to figure out why, and let you know what, if anything, you can do.
Reform card is gone.... you aren't the first one/
probably if u try to login it tells you why u were banned..
